text: Ntumintumi gwa kumpindi yumonga kasokiti, katola shetezu sha zaabu, kagoloka palongolu pa shitalawanda sha kutambikira pa kutumisiya ubani. Nayomberi wampananiti ubani uvuwa kawutumisiyi pamuhera na maluwa ga wantu woseri wa Mlungu pashitalawanda sha kutambikira sha zaabu yayiweriti palongolu pa shibanta sha ufalumi.
